ModMetaData.name: NEO Scavenger Soundtrack
ModMetaData.description:
NEO Scavenger is a game where you must survive in the wasteland long enough to figure out who you are.
Track List: After Michigan, Beyond the Swamp, Coalesce, Desperate Measures, Distant Signals, Dust, Empty Horizon, Hindsight, Making Time, Over the City, Reflections Rising, Ritual, The Vast, Trailing Lights, Unfamiliar Surroundings, Urban Pulse.
ModMetaData.author: karbonpanzer
